title: Status Effects
content: e Invisibility Condition - Can see Invisible creatures within 9m. Creatures must succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw or lose their invisibility. Can only be obtained by completing the Act 1 Quest Rescue Volo. After rescuing Volo from the Shattered Sanctum, speak to him at Camp about removing the parasite and agree to undergo surgery.
